Hero.description: Experience the perfect fusion of traditional craftsmanship and cutting-edge AI technology. Each piece is a masterpiece, tailored to your vision.

Features.title: Where Tradition Meets Innovation
Features.description: We believe the future of furniture lies in harmonizing time-honored craftsmanship with cutting-edge technology.
Features.craftsmanship_desc: Every piece is handcrafted by master artisans with decades of experience, ensuring unparalleled quality and attention to detail.
Features.ai_desc: Our proprietary AI technology optimizes ergonomics, proportions, and structural integrity for perfect balance of form and function.
Features.materials_desc: We source only the finest sustainable hardwoods, premium fabrics, and eco-friendly finishes from around the world.
Features.sustainable_desc: Committed to environmental responsibility, we use certified sustainable materials and carbon-neutral production methods.

ProductGallery.collection_desc: Each piece is handcrafted by master artisans, enhanced by AI precision for perfect proportions and timeless elegance.

AIAssistant.title: Your Personal Design Assistant
AIAssistant.description: Harness the power of AI to create your perfect space. Get instant recommendations, visualizations, and expert guidance tailored to your taste.
AIAssistant.welcome_message: Welcome to Mamedov Furniture's AI Design Assistant! I'm here to help you find the perfect furniture pieces for your space. What style are you looking for?
AIAssistant.placeholder: Ask about furniture, styles, or design ideas...

suggestions.2: I need a dining table for 8 people
suggestions.3: What wood finishes do you have?

features.recommendations_desc: AI analyzes your preferences to suggest perfect pieces
features.assistance_desc: Get instant answers about products and customization
features.staging_desc: Visualize furniture in your space with AR technology

Footer.brand_desc: Redefining luxury living through artisan craftsmanship and AI innovation.
